name: They Come From the Ocean!!!
description:
Hello everyone (Dylan Fries, you're probably the only one here)!

Barnacles from the ocean have mutated and started claiming bodies lost at sea. Now they've built up their ranks and are coming for you. Defend this sea side town and prevent them from infecting the city!

This is a game I made for Video Game class for the Digital Media Design program at Red River College. This is the first time I used unity and never had any experience with C# before so I hope this game is not too bad. I googled most of this so blame google if it's bad. jk, it was me.

Special thanks to all the tutorials I found online and people who are smarter than me. Links below!

https://www.raywenderlich.com/269-how-to-create-a-tower-defense-game-in-unity-part-1

https://www.google.com/search?q=how+to+make+exit+button+unity&oq=how+to+make+exit+unity+&aqs=chrome.1.69i57j0l2.13183j0j1&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8#kpvalbx=1

https://2dgameartguru.com/top-down-view-zombies/

Nathaniel Lie for helping with camera manger

Mathieu Graham for helping me figure out why my tutorial button stopped working

Music downloaded from YouTube audio library. Attribution not required but provided below.

Spine chilling cardiac tension by Biz Baz Studio
